```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Number of items ordered in every aisle by bar chart

```{r}
data('instacart')
instacart <- instacart[1:10000,]
  
instacart %>% group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    y = ~aisle, x = ~n, color = ~aisle,
    type = 'bar', colors = 'viridis'
  )

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Days since the prior order distribution of products by boxplot

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  filter(aisle == c('baking ingredients')) %>% 
  mutate(product_id = as.character(product_id)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x= ~product_id, y = ~days_since_prior_order, color = ~product_id,
    type = 'box', colors = 'viridis'
  )

```
